entities.description: The use of tobacco products such as cigarettes, smokeless tobacco (i.e., snuff, dip, chewing tobacco, or snus), cigars, or pipe tobacco.
The duration that encompasses an individual's entire life up to the point of the survey.
The duration that encompasses the 12 months prior to the survey.
The duration that encompasses the 30 days prior to the survey.
The demographic characteristic that differentiates individuals as male or female.
The demographic characteristic that classifies individuals based on race and ethnicity categories such as Hispanic Origin and Race.

relationships.description: Specifies that tobacco product use is measured over an individual's lifetime.
Specifies that tobacco product use is measured over the past year.
Specifies that tobacco product use is measured over the past month.
Indicates that tobacco product use data is categorized by gender.
Indicates that tobacco product use data is categorized by race and ethnicity.
